comments:

Unfortunately the fragments are frozen in 3.3, and the fragments for post-3.3
are handled by a different team. Please check TPTP 4.0 to see if the problem
persists, and if so, then reopen this defect and I'll target it to TPTP 4.1.
(4.0 is shutting down too and only stop-ship defects can be considered at this
stage.)

ok. Closing. I've confirmed that the 4.0 didn't have this error that contained 
nl directory for info pop.
